attributes.action: Were you as impressed as us with Adam Arifiye tonight on Newsnight?
attributes.additional_details:
The FIRST time for MANY years, certainly since the last election, a politician was heard to say 'I want to give the people what they so plainly want'.  You will, of course, do everything in your power to ensure that doesn't happen.

Always keep in your mind, Mr Cameron, that no matter how much it costs; no matter how long it takes; no matter where you try to hide, the people of this land will put you in the dock for your treasonous destruction of democracy in this country.  And, for your trial, the death penalty will be on the table.
